text: For the new extensions, I see you can use TS for the front-end components, but all the mentions/examples for the serverless functions are JS based, so assume it is limited to JS right now for those?

~We do have some examples that use TS, but we are still working on making sure we have all the edge cases covered before we lean into that more heavily. By that I mean, making sure we have good guidance on what needs to be in the tsconfig for things to work properly, etc.~

Sorry Reed, I read your question too quickly! You are correct, that is the case currently. But we are always listening for feedback like this to help determine which directions we should consider for the future, so thank you for the question!
